text: == Events == *January 23 – The Principality of Liechtenstein is created within the Holy Roman Empire * April 25 – Daniel Defoe publishes Robinson Crusoe * June 10 – Battle of Glen Shiel * Prussia conducts Europe's first systematic census * Miners in Falun, Sweden find an apparently petrified body of Fet-Mats Israelsson in an unused part of the copper mine. *France declares war on Spain ==Births== ==Deaths== *Christoph Ludwig Agricola
